Resize_File_Descriptor.Description: Make the file descriptor panel automatically resize if necessary

Migrate_Tab.Description: Add a context item to migrate a tab from one term to another and properly update

Preserve_Tabs_On_Exit.Description: Make the open tabs be saved to a history file

Course_Display.Description: Add a Main Form tab for viewing available courses

Re-Organize_Gui.Description: Re-organize the options gui with tabs into general tab, performance,

Performance_Tab.Description: Add a performance tab for modifying the number of threads in the pool, the time-out, and prestarting

Display_Color_Tab.Description: Add a tab to allow the user to specify their own display schedule color scheme

Initial_Size_Option.Description: Make the initial size a preference that can be changed

Comment_Classes.Description: Leave classes open if they are not fully commented
